FulfillmentAsset.name: FulfillmentAsset
FulfillmentAsset.description: Represents an instance of a technical product used to provide a customer asset.

Name.description: The name of the fulfillment asset.

ProductId.description: The identifier of the corresponding product.

ScopeIdentifierText.description: The scope in which this fulfillment asset record is created. This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.

Status.description: The status of the fulfillment asset.

UnitOfMeasureId.description: The unit of measure for the asset quantity such as, unit, gallon, ton, or case. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later.
